This course is designed to bridge the gap between programming and algorithmic problem-solving using the C++ programming language. Students will learn the fundamentals of C++, including object-oriented programming concepts,.

This course explores Amazon Web Services (AWS), one of the leading cloud computing platforms. Participants learn to harness the power of AWS to deploy, manage, and scale applications and infrastructure in the cloud.
